channel.title: Does anyone now the code for making mods and admins without files? Its a code?!?
channel.description: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: know hwo to make command wiht out useing files???You can make it i know you can!

item.title: Does anyone now the code for making mods and admins without files? Its a code?!?
item.dc:creator: @LittleMaffia LittleMaffia
item.description:
@LittleMaffia wrote:

It was hard but ok here it is:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“giveadmin) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+” is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)) {
String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“giveowner”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a co-owner");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“removeright”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

[/code]

put that in your command list

Enjoy.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone now the code for making mods and admins without files? Its a code?!?

item.title: Does anyone now the code for making mods and admins without files? Its a code?!?
item.dc:creator: @Inmate1 Inmate™
item.description:
@Inmate1 wrote:

[code]public int mods() {
if(playerName == SOMENAME) {
return 1;
}

public int admins() {
if(playerName == SOMENAME) {
return 1;
}

public void playerrights() {
if(mods == 1) {
playerRights = 1;
}
if(admins == 1) {
playerRights = 2;
}[/code]

I think something like that should work …
